title: Whoaz Riots Game please why did you done this :((
body: I was logged in today to play an game of Ahri (my favorite champon and waifu) an get a note from you that saying I am banned forever for using programs from 3rd party, I sincereley do not no who they are but I do not use anything made by them and I swore on that. Please can you finds it in your hearts to unbaned me I done no things wrong :((
